property.name: CardText
property.value: E Destroy 1 foundation: If this attack deals damage, your opponent must either play a non-attack as their next form this turn or pass. E Commit 2 foundations: Add the top card of your deck to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Discard 5 momentum: Your Combat Phase ends, and then your opponent skips their Ready Step during their next turn. Remove this card from the game.

property.name: CardText
property.value: At the end of the turn, lose X vitality. X equals 4 minus the number of forms you attempted this turn. During your opponent's turn, they may only attempt as many forms as you attempted in your last turn. If you performed no forms other than to pass in your preceding turn, your opponent plays as normal.

card.name: Hallowed Slug of the Heavenly Conqueror

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 2 momentum: If this attack deals damage, for the rest of this turn your opponent may only play enhances or responses if they have an asset with an enhance or repsonse printed on it in their staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up). If this attack is not blocked, your opponent's assets do not ready during their next Ready Step.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, add the top 2 cards of your deck to your momentum.

property.name: Split Rules
property.value: F: Commit 1 card in your opponent's staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If your attack is not blocked, add the top card of your deck to your momentum. E Commit: Commit 1 of your opponent's foundations. It does not ready during your opponent's next Ready Step.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your opponent discards 1 non-attack card from their card pool. If they cannot, for their next form this turn either they must attempt to play a non-attack card or pass. Only playable during your opponent's turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, discard 1 card: Add the top 2 cards of your deck to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: Your attack gets +X damage. X equals your opponent's momentum minus your attack's control (minimum 0). E Discard 1 momentum: If your attack deals damage, gain X vitality. X equals 6 minus the control of your attack.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Destroy 2 foundation: Your attack gets +X damage. X equals 3 times the number of attacks in your card pool minus the total control of All the attacks in your card pool (minimum 0). If your character is Chae, discard this card from your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Gain X vtiality. X equals 7 minus your attack's control (minimum 0). Chae E Destroy this asset, commit 6 foundations: Your non-throw attack gets +X damage. X equals your vitality minus the total of each player's momentum (minimum 0).

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: If this attack deals damage, gain X vitality. X equals the damage dealt minus the block modifier of any card your opponent has used to block in their card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: IF this attack is not blocked, it gets +X damage. X equals your opponent's momentum minus yours (minimum 0).

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: This attack gets +X damage. X equals the amount of vitality you gained the last time you gained vitality this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, commit 1 foundation: Your attack gets +X damage. If it deals damage, you gain X vitality. X equals 4 minus this attack's control.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: Gain X vitality. X equals your opponent's momentum minus yours (minimum 0).

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If your attack's damage is less than its printed damage, return it to its printed damage. If not, your attack gets +1 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: Until the end of the turn, whenever you add 1 or more cards to your momentum, your opponent adds 1 card from their hand to their momentum. If your opponent has no cards in hand after that, they may add All of their cards in their momentum to their hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard X momentum: Either your opponent discards X of their momentum, or your opponent adds half of X (rounded down) cards from their hand to their momentum (your choice). Only playable during your attack.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, add X cards from your hand to your momentum: Add half of X (rounded up) cards from your momentum to your hand. Fio F Commit 2 foundations, destroy this asset: At the end of this turn, each player discards half of the cards in their momentum (rounded up).

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: If this attack deals damage, your opponent discards All face up cards in their momemtum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage and your opponent has more momentum than you, your opponent discards momentum until they have the same number of momentum as you. Then you add X cards from the top of your deck to your momentum. X equals the amount of momentum your opponent discards due to this ability.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, your opponent adds 1 card from their hand to their momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Add 2 cards from your staging area to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, add 1 card from your hand to your momentum: Each player adds 1 card from their hand to their momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, discard 1 momentum: Your opponent discards 1 of their momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If your attack deals damage, add it to the bottom of your deck. R Commit: After you make a control check, that check gets +2 or -2 (your choice).

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Discard 1 momentum: Reveal the bottom card of your deck. If it is an attack or action card that could be played, attempt to play it.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit, discard 2 momentum: Add up to 2 cards from your card pool to the bottom of your deck. Hanzo R Destroy this asset: After you make a control check, that check gets +3 ot -1 (your choice).

property.name: CardText
property.value: After you play an attack, you may add this attack to the bottom of your deck from your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up). E: If this attack is not blocked, the next control check you make this turn gets +2.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 card and 1 momentum: After this attack resolves, add it to the bottom of your deck.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, add X cards from your staging area to the bottom of your deck: Add X cards from your card pool to the bottom of your deck.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Destroy this foundation: After you make a control check, that check gets +3.

property.name: CardText
property.value: First F Commit: Until the beginning of your next turn, cards may not be removed from either player's card pool during a Combat Phase.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 2 foundations: Your opponent discards 1 card. Your attack gets +X damage. X equals the control of the discarded card. Only playable during your turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: Your attack gets +X damage. X equals the highest control on a card in your opponent's discard pile.

property.name: CardText
property.value: First E Commit: If this attack deals damage, your opponent discard 1 card. Jivatma E Destroy this asset: If your opponent has 7 or more cards with the same control in their discard pile, your attack gets +X damage. X equals double the control value shared among those cards.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: IF this attack deals damage, your opponent adds 2 cards from their hand to the top of their deck.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: This attack gets +X damage. X equals the highest control on an attack in your opponent's discard pile.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, your opponent discards 2 cards. Only playable if your opponent has 4 or more cards in hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your attack gets +2 damage. Only playable if your opponent has discarded a card this Combat Phase.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, commit 1 foundation: Your opponent discards 1 card. Only playable during your attack.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, discard X cards: Your opponent discards X cards. If X equals 3 or less, your attack gets a damage bonus equal to the number of cards your opponent discards. If your opponent no longer has any cards in hand, then your Combat Phase ends after your attack resolves. Only playable during your attack.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Reveal the top card of your deck: If the revealed card's attack zone matches the attack zone of your attack, your attack gets +X damage. X equals the damage of your attack minus the control of the revealed card. F Commit: Until the end of the turn, your {Earth} and {Fire} or {Fire} and {Life} attacks get +2 speed (your choice).

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If every card in your card pool shares at least 2 resource symbols with your character, this attack gets +X speed. X equals triple the number of cards that are in your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your {Earth} and {Fire} or {Earth} and {Life} attack gets +3 speed. Leona E Destroy this asset: Your attack gets +X damage. X equals double that attack's block modifier.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit X {Earth} foundations: This attack gets +X damage. E Commit X {Fire} foundations: This attack gets +X speed.E Commit X {Life} foundations: If this attack deals damage, gain X vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Reveal the top card of your deck. If the revealed card's block zone matches the attack zone of this attack, this attack gets +X damage. X equals the revealed block modifier.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up). E: IF this attack is not blocked, the next {Fire} or {Life} attack you play this turn gets +X speed. X equals half of that attack's speed (rounded up).

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your {Fire} or {Life} attack gets +X speed. X equals half the number of {Life} cards in your staging area (rounded up).

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your {Earth} or {Fire} attack gets +X speed. X equals the number of cards in your staging area that have both {Earth} and {Fire}.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Reveal the top card of your deck. Your attack gets +X damage. X equals the block modifier of your revealed card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: At the end of a turn, if you have lost 8 or more vitality that turn, gain 3 vitality. E Commit: This attack gets -3 damage (minimum 1).

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: At the end of the turn, if you have lost 10 or more vitality this turn, gain 5 vitality.

property.name: Split Rules
property.value: If this attack is blocked, it deals no damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: At the end of a turn, if you have lost 6 or more vitality. If your character is Maxima, gain and additional 2 vitality. E Commit: This Ranged attack gets -4 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack is not blocked, at the end of the turn gain 3 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, for the rest of this turn gain 1 additional vitality whenever you gain vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: This card may be played as a block against any Ranged attack as if this card has a mid block of +0. E: If this attack deals damage, All attacks get -1 damage until the beginning of your next turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: At the end of your turn, gain 1 vitality. F Commit: Gain 1 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, commit 1 foundation: Reduce your opponent's throw attack's damage to 0.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: This attack gets -1 damage (minimum 1). If your character is Maxima, it gets an additional -1 damage (minimum 1).

property.name: CardText
property.value: After your opponent's Combat Phase begins, add the top card of your deck to your momentum. E: If this attack deals damage, the next attack you attempt to play as a Reversal this turn gets -2 difficulty.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals 5 or more damage, the next attack you attempt to play as a Reversal this turn gets -4 difficulty

property.name: CardText
property.value: After your opponent's Combat Phase begins, if your character is committed, add the top card of your deck to your momentum. E Commit: If you attempt to block this attack, the difficulty to block gets -2.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up). E Commit 1 foundation: If this attack is not blocked, at the end of the turn add the top card of your deck to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: This card may be played as a block against any Ranged attack as if this card has a mid block of +0. E: If this attack deals damage, destroy 1 asset. Only playable during your opponent's turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: This card may be played as a block against any Ranged attack as if this card has a mid block of +0. E: If this attack deals damage, destroy 1 foundation. Only playable during your opponent's turn.

card.name: Descended from a Long Line of Witches

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, reveal 1 Reversal from your hand: If the Reversal has a difficulty of 6 or greater, add the top card of your deck to your momentum.

card.name: The Wielder of Miraculously Mystic Powers

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard X momentum: If you attempt to play an attack as a Reversal to this attack, that attack gets -4 difficulty. X equals this attack's speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After your opponent's Combat Phase begins, add the top card of your deck to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: If this attack deals damage, ready up to 2 foundations that have not been readied this Combat Phase. E Commit 1 foundation: Your opponent discards 1 of their momentum. Only playable during your attack.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If your attack deals damage, ready every foundation in your staging area that has not already been readied this Combat Phase and then your foundations cannot be readied until the end of the turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your opponent discards 1 of their momentum: Then you add the top card of your deck to your momentum. Soriee E Destroy this asset: If this attack deals damage, ready X foundations in your staging area that have not been readied this Combat Phase. X equals your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, your opponent discards X of their momentum. X equals the amount of damage dealt.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, when you clear it from your card pool at the end of this turn, you may discard it to have your opponent discard 2 of their momentum instead.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: If this attack deals damage, ready up to 2 foundations that have not been readied this Combat Phase.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, discard 2 momentum: Your opponent discards 3 of their momentum. Only playable during your attack.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After the following enhance is played for the third or greater time in a turn, commit this card. E: If this attack deals damage, ready 1 of your foundations that has not been readied this Combat Phase.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If this attack is blocked, ready up to 2 foundations that have not been readied this Combat Phase.

property.name: CardText
property.value: At the end of your turn draw 2 cards. E Commit: If your attack deals damage, gain X vitality. X equals double the amount of damage your attack deals.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, gain 2 vitality and at the end of the turn draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If this attack deals damage, gain X vitality. X equals the attack's difficulty. Terry R Destroy this asset: Before your turn ends, draw 2 cards and then discard cards until you have a number of cards in your hand equal to your hand size or less.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, when you clear it from your card pool at the end of this turn, draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 2 momentum: If this attack deals damage, gain 2 vitality and at the end of the turn draw 2 cards.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is in your card pool after you have played it as an attack, your vitality gains may not be canceled.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If your attack deals damage, gain X vitality. X equals 5 minus your attack's control.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: At the end of this turn, if you have fewer cards in your hand than your hand size, draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this foundation is committed at the end of your turn, you may destroy it to draw 1 card. E Commit: Gain 1 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Your attack gets +X damage. X equals the number of resource symbols your attack shares with your character. E Commit: Until the beginning of your next turn, you have no maximum vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If your attack deals damage, gain X vitality. X equals the difficulty of your attack. If your character is Yuri, gain an additional 2 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: Once per turn gain X vitality. X equals the lowest control in your opponent's discard pile. Yuri E Destroy this asset, commit 4 foundations: Your attack gets +X damage. X equals the difference between your current vitality and your printed vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, gain X vitality. X equals the highest difficulty in your opponent's discard pile.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up). E: If this attack is not blocked, gain X vitality. X equals the total of the 2 lowest control values in your opponent's discard pile +3.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Destroy 1 {Earth} foundation: This attack gets +2 damage. E Destroy 1 {Life} foundation: This attack gets +2 speed.E Destroy 1 {Water} foundation: If this attack deals damage, add any card from your card pool to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Gain X vitality. X equals the difficulty of any attack in your opponent's discard pile. Only playable during your opponent's turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, remove an attack in your discard pile from the game: This attack gets +X damage. X equals the control of the removed attack.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Destroy this foundation: This attack gets +X damage. X equals the difficulty of any attack in your opponent's discard pile.
